extendedInfo.description: Like tough word challenges? Want to improve your English vocabulary and general knowledge?  Then Word Jam is for you!Word Jam provides unlimited Crossword puzzles, Word Search, Hangman, Word Jumbles, and other mind-tingling word games all in one box!Add to this a 100,000+ words built-in dictionary, with words carefully grouped into logical subsets for faster learning.Includes multiple themes to choose from depending on your taste.So get cracking, and try out this free app now!  Don't forget to rate it if you like it.  More features and games coming soon!Optimized for phones and tablets.* Rated Best New Game of the Week by CooLoserTech (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ej4z77yVwW0)* Reviewed by MakeUseOf.com and referred to as a "fun and engaging vocabulary builder game" (http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/boost-vocabulary-fun-free-games-android-21/)Search Tags: Word, Word Game, Word Search, Word Find, Word Puzzle, Word Challenges, Challenge, Dictionary, Crossword, Crossword Puzzle, Hangman, Hangman Game, Meaning, Vocabulary, English, Word Power, English crossword, Grammar, Board Game, Words Game, Vocabulary Trainer, Offline dictionary, Dictionary, Words, Vocab builder, Word Jumble, Word Scramble, Anagrams, Scrabble

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: An amazing app, an excellent way of spending time in a productive way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brain Food
reviews.comment: This app is the best I have found thus far for people that enjoy learning vocabulary. To the creators of this, I send a big, heartfelt thank you!
reviews.author: Sandra Pulham

reviews.title: Raini
reviews.comment: Brilliant !!! a must-have for english learners, Keep improving and always make it free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really is an all-in-one and tough too:-) .  Can\'t believe it\'s free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Educational
reviews.comment: Fun to play, just wish I knew how many questions are in a puzzle...must fix please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Random.
reviews.comment: Definition clues were vague and often wrong. Not a very visually stimulating game either. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Can\'t. Stop. PLAYING!!!! There are typos and spelling errors, but those are once in a thousand. Sometimes the same word will pop up more than once for the hangman or word jumble. Also, when a description is excessively long, it cuts off the \"playing field\", so to speak.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A delight!
reviews.comment: Lovers of words and puzzles will like this sweet little app. Well constructed, but could be improved along word choices. Continual scoring would improve it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maria 23/08/12
reviews.comment: Great game, worth playing highly recommend you download today.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Y
reviews.comment: A terrific app, a \"where-have-you-been-all-my-life\" for any English language enthuasiast, HIGHLY recommended. Not boring at all, not too hard, and not too easy, with just enough variety in games (crossword, word search, hangman, quiz) and vocab to make it fun learning for any time of the day. Love the current layout design, please don\'t change it, and always keep it free and ad-free, much appreciated. Hope I never overuse it to the point of having seen all the words there are.
reviews.author: Harmony T.S.L

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I\'d like to see more puzzle games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exellent game! Improves your vocabluary
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Ignore all the other word searches that request unnecessary permissions. This one is the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wordjam
reviews.comment: Great game love testing myself

reviews.title: Word jam
reviews.comment: Excellent I liked it very much

reviews.title: Delightful...
reviews.comment: A great way to spend a few moments of \'wait time\' in a productive manner. Thank you for providind an app that is \'free\'.  Topher
